p: Conde-Hernández extracted the essential oil of rosemary ( Rosmarinus officinalis) by S-CO 2 extraction, hydro distillation and steam distillation. He found that both yields of essential oil and antioxidant activity of SFC extract were higher than those from other two methods [ 30]. S-CO 2 modified with 2% ethanol at 300 bar and 40 °C gave higher extracting selectivity of vinblastine ( 53, Fig. 7) (an antineoplastic drug) from Catharanthus roseus, which is 92% more efficient for vinblastine extraction compared to traditional extraction methods [ 31].
